name: E-Space
description:
Made for the Epitech Space Jam in two days.

You are the last human alive and you have to protect the universe against deadly creatures.
Take the commands of the LWSS Striker in this fast-paced shoot'em-up and try to get the best score on all the levels.

You will have 4 weapons at your disposal, each with their own characteristics!

CONTROLS :

Z : Activate the back thrusters.
Q & D : Rotate the ship.
SPACE : Use the turbo-booster.
Left Mouse Click : Shoot.
Mouse Wheel : Switch Weapons

Made by :
Nathan LECORCHET
Kylian BALAN
Ghassane SEBAÏ
Nathan BELLANGER
Fabien LAUNAY
Antoine GOSSELIN

Music and Art by :
Ghassane SEBAÏ
Nathan BELLANGER.
